channel.title: Anyone got a tut for making npcs attack eachother
channel.description: One day I was looking through moparscape and i found a server with a full pest control, it showed a bunch of npc's attacking the void knight, i was wondering how i could do this, because for a quest im gonna have my camera move out and into an open field with bando fighting kre'arra, so if you know anything about this, plz post here :P

item.title: Anyone got a tut for making npcs attack eachother
item.dc:creator: @Meli Meli
item.description:
@Meli wrote:

i dont know about npc vs npc…but it sounds like a cool thing to see…let me know if you get it working

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone got a tut for making npcs attack eachother
